title: CLAUDE.md
text:
This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.


This is a Quarto website for Simply Detailed LLC, a locally-owned cleaning service in Knoxville, TN. The website is a static business site built with Quarto and published to GitHub Pages.





quarto render
This builds the entire website and outputs to the docs/ directory (configured in _quarto.yml).



quarto preview
Launches a live preview server with auto-reload when files change.



The site is published to GitHub Pages from the docs/ directory. After making changes:
quarto render
git add .
git commit -m "Update website"
git push







Project Type: Website
Output Directory: docs/ (GitHub Pages serves from this directory)
Theme: Cosmo with custom branding
Custom Styles: styles.css contains brand-specific styling with teal (#00b3b3) primary color




The website consists of several .qmd (Quarto Markdown) files that define pages:

index.qmd: Home page with company overview and contact information
about.qmd: About page featuring owner Meredith Dalton and work examples
location.qmd: Service area map (embedded Google Maps iframe)
photos.qmd: Photo gallery of work




Navigation is defined in _quarto.yml under website.navbar. The navbar includes: - Home (index.qmd) - About - Location



Custom CSS in styles.css uses: - Primary teal color (#00b3b3) for links and brand - Purple-to-teal gradients for visual elements - Card hover effects for interactive elements - Responsive design with Bootstrap components




images/: Contains business photos and logo

FullLogo_Transparent.png: Company logo
Various .jpeg files: Before/after cleaning photos






docs/: Production build directory (served by GitHub Pages)
_site/: Quarto build cache (gitignored)
.quarto/: Quarto metadata and cache (gitignored)





When editing content: - Images are referenced using Quarto syntax: ![](images/filename.ext){width="300"} - Contact information is on the home page (index.qmd) - HTML can be embedded using ```{=html} blocks (see location.qmd for example) - The site uses embedded resources (embed-resources: true) for self-contained pages

title: Simply Detailed LLC
text: Simply Detailed LLC is a locally-owned, operated, licensed and insured cleaning service in Knoxville, TN. We provide a range of services, including regular house cleaning and deep cleaning services for areas that need extra attention. The possibilities are truly endless in your requests for your cleaning needs. Simply Detailed LLC strives to make every clean better, helping busy families and professionals is our specialty. Every Clean, Every Time.

title: About Simply Detailed LLC
text:
Hi! I’m Meredith Dalton, owner of Simply Detailed LLC.





It all started with a passion to help others. Little did I know, when I cleaned for my very first clients, through word-of-mouth only, I could create a full time career out of it. I truly fell in love with the job, my clients have become dear friends and family. As I became too busy to handle it alone, the idea to create a business was a natural progression. Through professionalism, hard work, a lot of love and offering clients detailed cleans to their specifications, Simply Detailed was born. I look forward to meeting new clients in the future!
